authorDescription: Jun Sakai is a software engineer, published author, and former professional soccer player – Teaches in Japanese
Spanish entrepreneur and digital marketing innovator – Teaches in Spanish

Executive coach specializing in helping leaders decide what to say and how to say it. Her work has been featured in Forbes, Women’s Health, BBC, WSJ, Marketplace Radio, Fast Company, SHRM, and others.
Apple Featured iOS Developer and iOS Instructor
Entrepreneur, investor, advisor, bestselling author, and tech media personality. After noticing that she was one of way too few women in tech, she founded Zuckerberg Media.
Principal and Owner of MindsparQ™, MHA, and a certified project manager with PMP and PMI-ACP credentials
